@mega hypno
Disagree. It's a novel ideal, but it's "implied NTR" and "delayed NTR". First, Satomi obviously act like "generic NTR victim 2039" in retrospect: she tells him not to worry about pain (because she is not a virgin at that point), she is overjoyed with (finally) physically connecting with the person she loves, soon after she can't bare the guilt, so she leaves him with tears in her eyes. Now, in the final act, MC, who obviously still have feelings for her (and probably only for her, she's more of a symbol of hope than a person) have to face reality, that someone else took all the experiences she supposed to have with him, and even his friend keeps taking them right in front of his eyes. After seeing that MC goes into mind break and basically gives up on human connections completely. New girlfriend is just a new toy to play with, that he will defile before she can leave him or be taken from him.

Not ntr people are retarded NTR or netorare is when your lover cheats on you with someone else. It's a common tag in hentai or doujins. There's also netori which describes basically the opposite, so when you steal someone else's lover. netorase In Netorare, the partner usually are unwilling (Although able to be aroused by the circumstances) and felt regret, sad, and anger about the situation. But in Netorase, the partner are actually wanting and willing to make her to have sex with other people. It's basically a willing cuckold. The partner pushed the female MC to other stranger and felt pleasure from seeing them. It's the ultimate Masochism.
